title: GADA Studios
descriptions: A cutting-edge creative tech studio that merges cinematic storytelling with next-generation web design principles. Specializes in creating immersive digital experiences that blend Web2 and Web3 technologies.
Built a custom headless CMS with Sanity.io for content modeling, paired with a Next.js frontend featuring dynamic route generation for thousands of NFT-based portfolio pages.
Implemented Web3 integrations including MetaMask wallet authentication, live NFT gallery displays using Alchemy API, and token-gated content sections for exclusive community access.
Developed a proprietary animation system using Framer Motion and Three.js to create signature transitions between project case studies and client work.
Optimized performance through ISR (Incremental Static Regeneration) for dynamic content and edge caching of media assets, achieving perfect Lighthouse scores across all devices.

title: Decentralized Real Estate Trading Platform
descriptions: A pioneering platform that enables fractional ownership of real estate assets through blockchain technology, allowing investors to buy and sell shares in properties.
Developed a secure smart contract system on Ethereum for asset tokenization, ensuring transparency and immutability of ownership records.
Integrated a user-friendly dashboard for investors to track their portfolios, view property performance metrics, and manage transactions seamlessly.
Implemented KYC/AML compliance features using third-party APIs to ensure regulatory adherence while maintaining user privacy.
Utilized IPFS for decentralized storage of property documents and transaction history, enhancing security and accessibility.
